imdb.plot outline: Each of the episodes showcases the process of the survey conducted by Non Water Sanitation and Department of Sociology of Pune University. The episodes show the roller coaster experience of the young team in collecting information from rural Indians.
imdb.title: Field Trip
plot: The series is made to showcase an extensive survey in rural India to understand the social and cultural barriers to the problem of Open Defecation.::Kalyani Rao

Each of the episodes showcases the process of the survey conducted by Non Water Sanitation and Department of Sociology of Pune University. The episodes show the roller coaster experience of the young team in collecting information from rural Indians.::Kalyani Rao
